If Ur Freaky Baby(with Surrounded By Idiots) (prod. Timbaland)
Recorded during a session in 1991. Samples 'The Lady In My Life' by Michael Jackson. Released through SoundCloud by Larry Lyons through the Livehouse Entertainment SC page.
It's Like That(with Surrounded By Idiots) (prod. Timbaland)
Recorded during a session in 1991. Samples 'Remind Me' by Patrice Rushen with the drum break being sampled from 'Synthetic Substitution' by Melvin Bliss. Released through SoundCloud by Larry Lyons through the Livehouse Entertainment SC page.

üèÜ Lupe Fiasco - Horn Synth [V1](feat. Pharrell Williams) (prod. The Neptunes)(If You Want To)
In April 2010, a 1:45 snippet called "Horn Synth" leaked online, though the song was later released with additional drums & titled "If You Want To" on Travis Barker's 2011 album "Give the Drummer Some". Fans speculated that the song was originally intended for Lasers (minus Travis's drums). However, in December 2009 Travis Barker had tweeted "Recording drums to this Pharrell/Lupe record for my album. Damn...", which confirms that the song was never planned for Lasers. A$AP Rocky - Piper [V1](prod. Pharrell Williams)(RIOT (Rowdy Pipe'n), Rowdy Rod Piper, Roddy Piper)
Earliest version of the song "Piper" which would later turn into the released track that was retitled to "RIOT (Rowdy Pipe'n)" in 2023. The song was being sold by Waterfalls for $600 who posted a snippet of the track on September 11th, 2022 and was said to be from 2021 with a 3:34 track length and features a minute long open verse that was later filled by Tyler, The Creator in following versions of the song. In a July 20th, 2023 interview with Complex when the official song released Rocky stated that he "recorded it probably a year ago and a half ago with Pharrell [Williams] in Miami" while FERG and Chad Hugo were in the studio as well.
‚≠ê A$AP Rocky - Piper [V2](feat. Tyler, The Creator) (prod. Pharrell Williams)(RIOT (Rowdy Pipe'n), Rowdy Rod Piper, Roddy Piper)
When the song "Piper" was initially created Rocky had Tyler, The Creator in mind to record over the open verse, which Tyler did, but then that feature was eventually scrapped just before the song released for unknown reasons as of right now. This version contains some lyrical changes from Rocky and a different structure. Firstly, a snippet was leaked on July 20th, 2023 and then was later leaked in full after a successful $700 groupbuy from TylerHub on August 6th, 2023 just after the official song released without the feature.
A$AP Rocky - Piper [V3](feat. Tyler, The Creator) (prod. Pharrell Williams)(RIOT (Rowdy Pipe'n), Rowdy Rod Piper, Roddy Piper)
During the Rolling Loud Portugal performance Rocky plays a seemingly later version of the song "Piper" which is confirmed to still feature the Tyler, The Creator verse as Rocky says "Play that Tyler and Pharrell new joint". This version of the song features additional adlibs not seen in the other previous version, and an alternate line as this version says "on a pussy nigga diet" while later versions say "opposite of quiet, pussy nigga diet".
A$AP Rocky - Piper [V4](feat. Tyler, The Creator) (prod. Pharrell Williams)(RIOT (Rowdy Pipe'n), Rowdy Rod Piper, Roddy Piper)
The latest version of "Piper", other than the released version, was first played during Rocky's Rolling Loud New York 2022 performance on September 24th, 2022 and during Rocky's Amazon Live Performance on December 8th, 2022 where Rocky states the title "Rowdy Rod Piper", but it has since been confirmed to have always been called "Piper" other than the released song's title. This version still features Tyler, The Creator as Rocky shouts him and Pharrell out during the Rolling Loud performance. This version features the alternate line "opposite of quiet, pussy nigga diet" instead of the "on a pussy nigga diet" line from the Rolling Loud Portugal 2022 performance just a few months before.
